title: Strengthening CS Competencies: Motivation-Enhanced Self-Directed Learning Program for Medical Residents

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain key clinical protocols with 80%+ accuracy through motivation-enhancing questioning.
Learners can analyze patient cases and propose 3+ differentiated treatment plans via virtual supervisor role-play simulations.
Learners demonstrate 10%+ higher learning immersion compared to pre-program motivation survey results upon program completion.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
